messages.title: STABILITY FOR BREXIT AND BEYOND
messages.content: Prime Minister Theresa May asks country for support to strengthen hand in Brexit negotiations and to lock in Britain’s economic progress.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Strong and Stable Leadership with Theresa May
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring five years of strong and stable leadership to see the country through Brexit and beyond.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The Best Possible Deal from Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Negotiating the best possible deal for Britain during Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Growing Economy to Secure Our Future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focus on economic growth to secure Britain's future.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Clear choice facing people in the June 8th General Election.

issues.brexitEurope: Strong and stable leadership needed to secure five years and to see the country through Brexit and beyond.
issues.economy: A growing economy to secure our future. Lock in Britain’s economic progress.

examples: Prime Minister Theresa May asks country for support to strengthen hand in Brexit negotiations and to lock in Britain’s economic progress.
Strong and stable leadership needed to secure five years and to see the country through Brexit and beyond.
Prime Minister Theresa May asks country for support to strengthen hand in Brexit negotiations and to lock in Britain’s economic progress.

Unstable coalition government, with Jeremy Corbyn propped up by the Liberal Democrats and the SNP, who want to reopen divisions of the referendum when we should be coming together to get the best deal for Britain.
